channel.title: Transfer Learning on Miss Vidhyalakshmi Parthasarathy
channel.description: Recent content in Transfer Learning on Miss Vidhyalakshmi Parthasarathy

item.title: Project 1: Credit Risk Assessment FinTech Framework
item.description: This project represents the credit risk assessment dual framework of predicting the credit scores in the range of 300 (poor score and least trust) to 850 (exceptional score and most trust) and the forecasts of the credit default risk probability of the individuals; which can be utilized by the financial institutions like commercial banks and lending firms to evaluate the credit worthiness of their customers and the new applicants.
